hero.heading: Our Services & Expertise
hero.subheading: Providing comprehensive guidance for students aspiring to study in Japan, including admissions support, visa assistance, and personalized counseling.

services.title: Counseling & Guidance
services.subtitle: Personalized Roadmap For Your Goal
services.description: Comprehensive assessment and planning for your Japan study journey

paragraphs.text: We evaluate your strengths, goals, and academic history to design a personalized roadmap for your education in Japan. Our counseling covers student visas, SSW, TITP programs, and potential scholarships, ensuring every step is tailored to your profile.

Our experts provide professional one-on-one guidance, helping you select universities and programs that align with your ambitions. We also offer advice on choosing majors, understanding course requirements, and navigating cultural adjustments.

This tailored approach ensures your application stands out, maximizes your chances of acceptance, and equips you with strategies for success in interviews, documentation, and pre-departure preparation.

services.title: Language & Exam Preparation
services.subtitle: Master Japanese & International Tests
services.description: Comprehensive preparation for JLPT, TOEFL, IELTS and entrance exams

paragraphs.text: Our structured Japanese language classes build strong reading, writing, listening, and speaking skills. Students learn practical communication for both academic and professional contexts, while also gaining cultural insights for smooth integration into Japan.

We offer targeted exam preparation for JLPT, TOEFL, IELTS, and other entrance tests. Personalized feedback, practice sessions, and time management strategies help students confidently tackle exams and achieve high scores.

Mock tests and regular evaluations track progress, identify strengths and weaknesses, and prepare students for academic, work, or visa-related requirements. Continuous mentorship ensures improvement and readiness for real-life scenarios.

services.title: University & Program Selection
services.subtitle: Find Your Perfect Japanese University
services.description: Strategic university matching based on your goals and qualifications

paragraphs.text: We analyze your academic profile, career goals, and personal interests to shortlist the most suitable Japanese universities and programs. Our guidance ensures that students select programs offering the best fit academically and professionally.

We provide comprehensive information about courses, campus culture, scholarships, internships, TITP and SSW programs, and student life, helping you make informed decisions that match your aspirations.

Our team ensures that selected programs align with your long-term educational and career objectives, providing insights into post-graduation opportunities, work options, and professional networks in Japan.

services.title: Application & Documentation Support
services.subtitle: Flawless Application Assistance
services.description: Complete support for applications, documents, and essay preparation

paragraphs.text: We guide you through every step of the application process for student, SSW, and TITP programs. Our experts ensure that all documents are complete, error-free, and compliant with university or embassy requirements.
Our team reviews essays, SOPs, and recommendation letters, providing detailed feedback and enhancements to ensure your application is professional, compelling, and stands out among other applicants.
We prepare you for interviews and documentation checks, giving you confidence and clarity throughout the application process. Step-by-step coaching ensures readiness for all requirements.

services.title: Visa & Interview Preparation
services.subtitle: Seamless Immigration & Interview Support
services.description: Comprehensive support for visa applications and interview readiness for studying and working in Japan

paragraphs.text: We provide step-by-step guidance for student, SSW, and TITP visa applications, ensuring all documents are complete, accurate, and submitted correctly. Our process helps minimize delays and errors.
Our legal advisors review your documentation for compliance with Japanese immigration requirements, assist with embassy submissions, and provide tips to handle complex or unusual cases effectively.

We offer mock visa interviews and personalized coaching to build confidence, improve communication, and prepare you for potential questions. This ensures you are ready for real embassy interviews with professionalism.
Our training also covers soft skills such as body language, etiquette, and cultural awareness, helping applicants present themselves positively and increase their chances of visa approval.
After the visa approval, we provide guidance on arrival procedures, essential documentation to carry, and tips for smooth entry into Japan, ensuring a stress-free start to your journey.

services.title: Pre-Departure & Orientation
services.subtitle: Ready for Japan Life
services.description: Complete preparation for your new life, studies, and work in Japan

paragraphs.text: Comprehensive cultural, academic, and lifestyle preparation helps students and workers adapt quickly and smoothly when moving to Japan. Topics include etiquette, communication, and cultural norms.
Orientation covers practical guidance on housing, part-time jobs, healthcare, banking, and transportation to ensure a smooth transition to Japanese life.
Students and workers gain access to a 24/7 support network for questions, emergencies, and ongoing guidance, ensuring they feel confident and supported throughout their stay in Japan.

process.subtitle: Step-by-step guidance — from counseling in Nepal to your successful arrival in Japan.
process.btndes: Let us guide you from Nepal to Japan step by step.

processSteps.title: Initial Consultation
processSteps.description: We begin with a personalized consultation to understand your background, career goals, and future aspirations. Whether you want to pursue higher studies in Japan or apply for SSW/TITP opportunities, our counselors carefully assess your profile and create a tailored plan. This ensures you start your journey with clarity, confidence, and a realistic roadmap designed to meet your goals.

processSteps.title: Language & Skill Training
processSteps.description: Japanese language is at the heart of both study and work in Japan. We provide interactive classes focused on JLPT preparation and communication skills, supported by practice sessions and mock exams. For SSW and TITP aspirants, we also offer skill-based training aligned with industry requirements. This blend of language and professional skills ensures candidates are fully prepared to excel in both academic and workplace environments.

processSteps.title: Pathway Selection
processSteps.description: After building a strong foundation, we guide you in choosing the right pathway. Students receive a curated list of universities and programs based on eligibility, budget, and long-term plans. For professionals, we provide targeted SSW job roles and TITP placements that match your skills and ambitions. This ensures every individual follows a pathway that maximizes opportunities and long-term growth in Japan.

processSteps.title: Documentation Support
processSteps.description: Our team provides complete end-to-end assistance with your documentation, including transcripts, resumes, statements of purpose, application forms, and visa paperwork. Every document is carefully reviewed for accuracy and professionalism, ensuring you meet the strict standards of Japanese institutions and employers. This detailed support removes confusion and minimizes errors during the application process.

processSteps.title: Visa Processing
processSteps.description: Visa processing is often the most stressful part of the journey, but we make it simple and stress-free. For students, we handle Certificate of Eligibility (COE), application forms, and interview coaching. For SSW and TITP applicants, we guide you through official documentation, contracts, and embassy requirements. With our expert support, you’ll feel fully prepared and confident throughout the entire process.

processSteps.title: Pre-Departure & Orientation
processSteps.description: Before you leave for Japan, we ensure you are well-prepared for your new journey. Our orientation covers Japanese culture, lifestyle, workplace or university expectations, and survival tips to adjust smoothly. We also assist with housing, travel arrangements, and provide a detailed checklist for a stress-free departure. This final step makes sure you begin your life in Japan with confidence and support.

que.subtitle: Everything you need to know about studying in Japan

faqs.question: Which opportunities in Japan can I apply for?
faqs.answer: We guide applicants for three major pathways: Student Visa for higher education, SSW (Specified Skilled Worker) for skilled jobs, and TITP (Technical Intern Training Program) for technical training. Each pathway is tailored to different goals—education, skilled employment, or industry-focused training.
faqs.subtitle: Pathways: Student, SSW, TITP

faqs.question: Do I need to know Japanese before applying?
faqs.answer: Yes, for SSW and TITP, Japanese language proficiency (JLPT or NAT tests) is mandatory. For Student Visas, many programs are available in English, but learning Japanese is highly recommended for daily life and better opportunities. We provide structured training before departure.
faqs.subtitle: Language preparation

faqs.question: What are the visa requirements for Student, SSW, and TITP visas?
faqs.answer: Student visas require admission to a Japanese institution and proof of finances. SSW visas require passing Japanese and skill exams, while TITP requires agreements through authorized sending and receiving organizations. We provide end-to-end support for all these processes.
faqs.subtitle: Visa documentation and process

faqs.question: Do you provide skill training before departure?
faqs.answer: Yes. We train candidates in language, cultural orientation, and job-specific skills to prepare them for Japan. For SSW and TITP, we focus on industry-specific requirements, while for students we prepare for academic and part-time work readiness.
faqs.subtitle: Pre-departure skill training

faqs.question: Is professional counseling available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide counseling from experienced advisors and representatives from Japan. This helps candidates understand their pathway, career growth, cultural expectations, and life in Japan before departure.
faqs.subtitle: Counseling and mentorship

faqs.question: Can students work part-time while studying?
faqs.answer: Yes, Student Visa holders can work up to 28 hours per week with proper work permits. We help students with permit applications and connect them with part-time job opportunities.
faqs.subtitle: Part-time work for students

faqs.question: What kind of jobs are available under the SSW visa?
faqs.answer: SSW visas cover industries such as caregiving, hospitality, construction, agriculture, and manufacturing. Applicants must pass skill exams for their chosen industry, and we guide candidates through the preparation and application.
faqs.subtitle: SSW industry options

faqs.question: What is the purpose of the TITP program?
faqs.answer: The TITP (Technical Intern Training Program) allows candidates to gain hands-on experience in Japan's industries while contributing to skill development. After training, many candidates return with enhanced expertise or transition to advanced opportunities.
faqs.subtitle: Technical Intern Training Program

faqs.question: Are scholarships or financial support available for students?
faqs.answer: Yes, international students can apply for scholarships like MEXT, JASSO, or university-specific grants. We guide you in identifying suitable scholarships and assist with applications to increase success rates.
faqs.subtitle: Scholarship opportunities

faqs.question: Do SSW and TITP workers get support with housing?
faqs.answer: Yes, many employers in Japan provide or arrange housing for SSW and TITP participants. We assist in reviewing contracts and ensuring proper accommodation is arranged.
faqs.subtitle: Accommodation for workers

faqs.question: What documents are required for applying?
faqs.answer: For Student visas, common requirements include admission letters, transcripts, and financial proof. SSW requires skill test certificates and Japanese language proficiency. TITP requires training agreements through approved organizations. We help compile and verify all documents.
faqs.subtitle: Application documentation

faqs.question: Do you help with interview preparation?
faqs.answer: Yes. We conduct mock interviews and provide coaching for both embassy and employer interviews. This ensures confidence and higher chances of success across Student, SSW, and TITP applications.
faqs.subtitle: Interview preparation

faqs.question: What kind of post-arrival support is available in Japan?
faqs.answer: We help with accommodation setup, bank accounts, health insurance registration, and orientation programs. Local partners also provide guidance for cultural adjustment and emergency support.
faqs.subtitle: Support after arrival

faqs.question: Can SSW workers switch industries in Japan?
faqs.answer: No, the SSW visa is tied to a specific industry. However, after gaining experience and qualifications, workers may explore advanced pathways or extensions within their field.
faqs.subtitle: SSW work flexibility

faqs.question: How long can I stay in Japan with these visas?
faqs.answer: Student visas typically last for the duration of the academic program. SSW visas are valid up to 5 years, depending on the industry. TITP visas usually cover 3–5 years of technical training.
faqs.subtitle: Visa duration

faqs.question: Do you provide Japanese cultural training?
faqs.answer: Yes, we prepare candidates for Japanese etiquette, workplace culture, and lifestyle. This helps students, SSW, and TITP participants integrate smoothly into society and workplaces.
faqs.subtitle: Cultural orientation

faqs.question: How do you ensure a higher visa success rate?
faqs.answer: Our team provides detailed document checks, mock interviews, skill training, and language preparation. With expert counseling and embassy guidance, we maintain high success rates across Student, SSW, and TITP visas.
faqs.subtitle: Visa success strategy

faqs.question: Can SSW and TITP workers transition to long-term opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, many workers move from TITP to SSW, and SSW workers can later apply for advanced categories or even permanent residency if they meet requirements. We guide you through possible future transitions.
faqs.subtitle: Future career growth
